title: My Runes aren't working in game
body: Lately i've noticed something weird i bought about 6k worth of runes and when i get ingame it doesn't work , i have about 16% crit on my runes but when i check my characteristics (By pressing C in game ) I have no crit at all and it only uses my masteries which is like 9 ad or something idk . I can't play anymore because no runes puts me at a huge disadvantage , please i need help . Riot fix this glitch holy crap .
